title: CamCrew
description: CamCrew is an intuitive platform that connects clients with professional cameramen for capturing high-quality event moments seamlessly.

title: Theme Scraping
description: This is a project involves web scraping TEDx website themes to analyze and categorize insightful topics discussed in TEDx talks.

title: Currency Converter
description: A web application that enables real-time currency conversion using an external API for up-to-date exchange rates.
